• Like a pilot on an airplane or a surgeon in a surgical theater, a birth attendant can
have great impact on how safe a mother and baby are during childbirth.
HOW DO CHECKLISTS WORK?
• Checklists do not contain new activities:  the items on a checklist are created 
from existing training, guidelines, and practices.
• The items on a checklist help us to remember the many practices we ought to 
perform during a complex situation.
• We can be forgetful.
• We can be distracted by emergencies
